caption:
This photograph captures a vibrant scene of urban gardening in a lush community garden. The setting is an open space surrounded by elements of urban architecture, providing a stark contrast between the natural growth in the foreground and the cityscape in the background.

In the foreground, three individuals are involved in gardening activities. From left to right: the first person, a woman, is looking towards her left while tugging slightly at her shorts; she seems to be mid-movement or adjusting herself. The second person, another woman, is bending over and is actively engaged in digging or planting. The third individual, a man, is also bent forward, and appears to be either planting or weeding beside the woman.

These gardeners are surrounded by an abundance of vibrant plants and flowers, suggesting the garden is well-tended and in full bloom. Various types of vegetation, including lush green leaves and bright flowers ranging from reds to yellows, fill the area, adding color and life to the scene.

In the background is a contrasting urban environment featuring deteriorating buildings with exposed brick and missing windows. Beyond these immediate structures, more modern and intact high-rise buildings can be seen, hinting at a diverse urban setting that mixes decay with development.

The overall composition of the image juxtaposes the nurturing, color-rich garden with the rough and gritty cityscape, highlighting a slice of nature and community effort amidst an urban setting.
title: City "farmers" cultivate thriving garden. Volunteers were assigned their plots by community association. The square block formerly the site of a brewery, extends from 92nd to 93rd Street and from 2nd to 3rd Avenue.
